heading: ʻOku foaki ʻe Sīsū ki he kau ākonga Nīfai ʻe toko hongofulu mā uá ʻa e mālohi ke foaki ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní. Taʻu T.S. 401–421 nai.

verses.txt: Ko e ngaahi folofola ʻa Kalaisi, ʻa ia naʻá ne folofola ʻaki ki heʻene kau ākongá, ʻa e toko hongofulu mā ua ʻa ia naʻá ne filí, ʻi heʻene hilifaki hono toʻukupú kiate kinautolú—

Pea naʻá ne ui ʻa kinautolu ʻi honau hingoá, ʻo pehē: Ke mou ui ki he Tamaí ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻi he fuʻu lotu lahi; pea ka hili hoʻomou fai ʻení te mou maʻu ʻa e mālohi koeʻuhi ko ia te mou hilifaki ki ai homou nimá, te mou foaki ki ai ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní; pea ʻi hoku hingoá te mou foaki ia, he ʻoku fai pehē ʻe heʻeku kau ʻaposetoló.

Ko ʻeni naʻe folofola ʻaki ʻe Kalaisi ʻa e ngaahi folofolá ni kiate kinautolu ʻi heʻene ʻuluaki hā maí; pea naʻe ʻikai fanongo ki ai ʻa e fuʻu kakaí, ka naʻe fanongo ki ai ʻa e kau ākongá; pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻa ia naʻa nau hilifaki ki ai honau ngaahi nimá, naʻe tō ki ai ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
